headline: Parker to Announce Fiscal 2026 Second Quarter Earnings on January 29; Conference Call and Webcast Scheduled for 11 a.m. Eastern
summary: CLEVELAND, Jan. 15, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that it will release its fiscal 2026 second quarter earnings before the market opens on Thursday, January 29, 2026, followed by a conference call at 11:00 a.m., Eastern time. During the call, the company will discuss fiscal 2026 second quarter results and respond to questions from institutional investors and security analysts. The conference c
